STIG Manager simplifies common tasks

Build A Collection with .ckl or XCCDF Files¶

Create your Collection and go to it’s Collection Management workspace by selecting the “Manage” node for your Collection in the Nav Tree. From here, select the “Import CKL or SCAP…” button in the Asset Panel, then check out the Import CKL or SCAP / Collection Builder portion of our User Guide for more info.

Import CKL or SCAP / Collection Builder
